title: 華春瑩稱義大利人「謝謝中国」  義外長直線抽擊：她專門散布假新聞

replies.msg:
（美聯社）

義大利網路媒體《調查連線》（Linkiesta）15日指出，針對中國外交部發言人華春瑩日前在「推特」聲稱，義國民眾在陽台高唱中國國歌，還大聲謝謝中國一事，義國外交部長迪馬尤（Luigi Di Maio）做出嚴正駁斥，指這是對方在「散播假新聞」。

報導指出，華春瑩是中國外交部新聞司司長兼發言人，換句話說，「她是中國宣傳機構的領頭人之一，她的角色很明顯包含散布假新聞，如同她在官方推特的發言。」

義國因武漢肺炎疫情擴散，正舉國實施「封城」等限制人員移動的措施。受困家中的義國民眾14日中午便在自家陽台向醫護人員鼓掌致謝，包括中國前去支援的醫護。華春瑩隨後在推特發布相關照片，指稱這些義國民眾正在高聲「謝謝中國」，還在羅馬街頭播放中國國歌，感謝中國襄助打敗病毒。另一名發言人趙立堅也發表相同推文。

對此，義國外交部長迪馬尤指出，義國還有其他緊急狀況和問題要處理，請北京停止在這個時候散布假新聞。

https://news.ltn.com.tw/news/world/breakingnews/3101510

https://www.linkiesta.it/it/article/2020/03/15/coronavirus-cina-italia-fake-news/45851/amp/?__twitter_impression=true

Google translate

The Chinese spread fake news on the skin of the Italians

The spokeswoman for the Beijing Foreign Minister said on Twitter that Italians come out on the balconies to thank China and sing the Chinese anthem. If we were a serious country, despite the emergency, the Farnesina and Di Maio would make themselves heard

Hua Chunying is the spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Minister, as well as general director of the Information Department of Beijing, that is, she is among the leaders of Chinese propaganda. His role evidently also includes spreading fake news, like the one he tweeted from his official profile.

The Beijing spokeswoman showed pictures of some Italians who came out on the balconies on Saturday at noon to applaud the medical and hospital staff engaged in dealing with the epidemiological emergency, also from China, explaining that the Italians had come to the windows to sing "Thank you China" and to spread the Chinese anthem on the streets of Rome in gratitude for the Chinese help in defeating the virus. By clicking on the video, the applause of the Italians is heard and the Chinese anthem is playing in the background. His deputy, Lijian Zhao, did the same thing.

We have other emergencies, other problems and maybe there will also have been someone who screamed thanks China, but if we were a serious country, the Farnesina and the minister who unfortunately the guide would make themselves heard to intimate Beijing to stop spreading fake news and more on our skin.
造假大國！

We have other emergencies, other problems and maybe there will also have been someone who screamed thanks China, but if we were a serious country, the Farnesina and the minister who unfortunately the guide would make themselves heard to intimate Beijing to stop spreading fake news and more on our skin.

吓, 只係記者踢爆佢, 唔係意粉國外長官方鬧佢喎
都好過冇.

quote.msg:
（美聯社）

義大利網路媒體《調查連線》（Linkiesta）15日指出，針對中國外交部發言人華春瑩日前在「推特」聲稱，義國民眾在陽台高唱中國國歌，還大聲謝謝中國一事，義國外交部長迪馬尤（Luigi Di Maio）做出嚴正駁斥，指這是對方在「散播假新聞」。

報導指出，華春瑩是中國外交部新聞司司長兼發言人，換句話說，「她是中國宣傳機構的領頭人之一，她的角色很明顯包含散布假新聞，如同她在官方推特的發言。」

義國因武漢肺炎疫情擴散，正舉國實施「封城」等限制人員移動的措施。受困家中的義國民眾14日中午便在自家陽台向醫護人員鼓掌致謝，包括中國前去支援的醫護。華春瑩隨後在推特發布相關照片，指稱這些義國民眾正在高聲「謝謝中國」，還在羅馬街頭播放中國國歌，感謝中國襄助打敗病毒。另一名發言人趙立堅也發表相同推文。

對此，義國外交部長迪馬尤指出，義國還有其他緊急狀況和問題要處理，請北京停止在這個時候散布假新聞。

https://news.ltn.com.tw/news/world/breakingnews/3101510

The Chinese spread fake news on the skin of the Italians

The Beijing spokeswoman showed pictures of some Italians who came out on the balconies on Saturday at noon to applaud the medical and hospital staff engaged in dealing with the epidemiological emergency, also from China, explaining that the Italians had come to the windows to sing "Thank you China" and to spread the Chinese anthem on the streets of Rome in gratitude for the Chinese help in defeating the virus. By clicking on the video, the applause of the Italians is heard and the Chinese anthem is playing in the background. His deputy, Lijian Zhao, did the same thing.

replies.msg:
https://hk.on.cc/hk/bkn/cnt/cnnews/20200316/mobile/bkn-20200316210107161-0316_00952_001.html

新冠疫情蔓延至歐洲，其中意大利疫情嚴重，中國早前派出醫療專家團隊援助意大利。中國官媒日前指意大利羅馬有市民用意大利語高喊「謝謝中國」；中國外交部發言人華春瑩、趙立堅亦在社交媒體Twitter上轉載。隨後，有意媒引述意大利外交部長，直指華春瑩在「散播假新聞」。

該段在羅馬拍攝的意大利市民播放《義勇軍進行曲》的短片，被內地官媒大肆報道。但意媒報道引述意大利外交與國際合作部長迪馬約（Luigi Di Maio），針對華春瑩在twitter的貼文予以駁斥，指意方還有其他緊急狀況和問題要處理，請北京停止在這個時候散播假新聞。
